regen.absent_element: action to handle mismatch between computed 'Message Digest' values and development records
regen.new_specification: The system shall generate an alert or notification when a mismatch is detected between the computed 'Message Digest' values and the development records.

regen.absent_element: action to take when computed 'Message Digest' values do not match development records
regen.new_specification: The system shall generate an alert or notification when computed 'Message Digest' values do not match development records.

regen.absent_element: action to take when 'Message Digest' values do not match
regen.new_specification: The system shall generate an alert or notification when the computed 'Message Digest' values do not match the development records.

label: A verification failure shall will cause an alarm condition for the affected control unit.
absence: action of alarm for a verification failure
